query.statement:
SELECT '' AS FLAG ,A.DEPT AS DEPT ,A.GJAHR AS GJAHR ,A.ITEM AS ITEM ,A.ADDGBN AS ADDGBN ,A.MATNR AS MATNR ,A.SPEC12 AS SPEC12 ,CASE WHEN A.SPEC3FR = '0000' THEN '' ELSE A.SPEC3FR END AS SPEC3FR ,CASE WHEN A.SPEC3TO = '0000' THEN '' ELSE A.SPEC3TO END AS SPEC3TO ,CASE WHEN A.SPEC5FR = '000' THEN '' ELSE A.SPEC5FR END AS SPEC5FR ,CASE WHEN A.SPEC5TO = '000' THEN '' ELSE A.SPEC5TO END AS SPEC5TO ,A.ECSF AS ECSF ,A.ETM AS ETM ,A.MATKL AS MATKL , A.AUSE AS AUSE , A.ACAPA AS ACAPA , A.AOPEN AS AOPEN , CASE WHEN A.AFQFR = '000' THEN '' ELSE A.AFQFR END AS AFQFR , CASE WHEN A.AFQTO = '000' THEN '' ELSE A.AFQTO END AS AFQTO , CASE WHEN A.ASTQFR = '000' THEN '' ELSE A.ASTQFR END AS ASTQFR , CASE WHEN A.ASTQTO = '000' THEN '' ELSE A.ASTQTO END AS ASTQTO , A.ADRV AS ADRV , A.ASPC AS ASPC , A.ACD1 AS ACD1 , A.ACD2 AS ACD2 , CASE WHEN A.BFTHFR = '000' THEN '' ELSE A.BFTHFR END AS BFTHFR , CASE WHEN A.BFTHTO = '000' THEN '' ELSE A.BFTHTO END AS BFTHTO , A.BWM AS BWM , A.BMOPB AS BMOPB , A.BCDM AS BCDM , A.BHR AS BHR , A.CJM1 AS CJM1 , CASE WHEN A.CJM1QFR = '000' THEN '' ELSE A.CJM1QFR END AS CJM1QFR , CASE WHEN A.CJM1QTO = '000' THEN '' ELSE A.CJM1QTO END AS CJM1QTO , A.CJM1M AS CJM1M , A.CJM1FR AS CJM1FR , A.CHD1 AS CHD1 , CASE WHEN A.CHD1QFR = '000' THEN '' ELSE A.CHD1QFR END AS CHD1QFR , CASE WHEN A.CHD1QTO = '000' THEN '' ELSE A.CHD1QTO END AS CHD1QTO , A.CHS1 AS CHS1 , CASE WHEN A.CHS1QFR = '000' THEN '' ELSE A.CHS1QFR END AS CHS1QFR , CASE WHEN A.CHS1QTO = '000' THEN '' ELSE A.CHS1QTO END AS CHS1QTO , A.DEPH AS DEPH , CASE WHEN A.DEPHTQFR = '000000' THEN '' ELSE A.DEPHTQFR END AS DEPHTQFR , CASE WHEN A.DEPHTQTO = '000000' THEN '' ELSE A.DEPHTQTO END AS DEPHTQTO , CASE WHEN A.EHOFR = '000000' THEN '' ELSE A.EHOFR END AS EHOFR , CASE WHEN A.EHOTO = '000000' THEN '' ELSE A.EHOTO END AS EHOTO , CASE WHEN A.EHTRHFR = '000000' THEN '' ELSE A.EHTRHFR END AS EHTRHFR , CASE WHEN A.EHTRHTO = '000000' THEN '' ELSE A.EHTRHTO END AS EHTRHTO , CASE WHEN A.EHPTO = '000000' THEN '' ELSE A.EHPTO END AS EHPTO , CASE WHEN A.EHPFR = '000000' THEN '' ELSE A.EHPFR END AS EHPFR , CASE WHEN A.EHHFR = '000000' THEN '' ELSE A.EHHFR END AS EHHFR , CASE WHEN A.EHHTO = '000000' THEN '' ELSE A.EHHTO END AS EHHTO , CASE WHEN A.EHVFR = '000000' THEN '' ELSE A.EHVFR END AS EHVFR , CASE WHEN A.EHVTO = '000000' THEN '' ELSE A.EHVTO END AS EHVTO , A.EHM AS EHM , CASE WHEN A.ECCAFR = '0000' THEN '' ELSE A.ECCAFR END AS ECCAFR , CASE WHEN A.ECCATO = '0000' THEN '' ELSE A.ECCATO END AS ECCATO , CASE WHEN A.ECCBFR = '0000' THEN '' ELSE A.ECCBFR END AS ECCBFR , CASE WHEN A.ECCBTO = '0000' THEN '' ELSE A.ECCBTO END AS ECCBTO , CASE WHEN A.ECCHFR = '0000' THEN '' ELSE A.ECCHFR END AS ECCHFR , CASE WHEN A.ECCHTO = '0000' THEN '' ELSE A.ECCHTO END AS ECCHTO , CASE WHEN A.ECAAFR = '0000' THEN '' ELSE A.ECAAFR END AS ECAAFR , CASE WHEN A.ECAATO = '0000' THEN '' ELSE A.ECAATO END AS ECAATO , CASE WHEN A.ECBBFR = '0000' THEN '' ELSE A.ECBBFR END AS ECBBFR , CASE WHEN A.ECBBTO = '0000' THEN '' ELSE A.ECBBTO END AS ECBBTO , CASE WHEN A.ECEEFR = '0000' THEN '' ELSE A.ECEEFR END AS ECEEFR , CASE WHEN A.ECEETO = '0000' THEN '' ELSE A.ECEETO END AS ECEETO , CASE WHEN A.ECJJFR = '0000' THEN '' ELSE A.ECJJFR END AS ECJJFR , CASE WHEN A.ECJJTO = '0000' THEN '' ELSE A.ECJJTO END AS ECJJTO , CASE WHEN A.ECHHFR = '0000' THEN '' ELSE A.ECHHFR END AS ECHHFR , CASE WHEN A.ECHHTO = '0000' THEN '' ELSE A.ECHHTO END AS ECHHTO , A.ETMM AS ETMM , A.ERPD AS ERPD , A.ERPW AS ERPW , A.ERPR AS ERPR , A.ECRL AS ECRL , A.ECGV AS ECGV , A.ECWRL AS ECWRL , A.ECWW AS ECWW , A.ECWSF AS ECWSF , A.DSV1 AS DSV1 , A.DCCTV AS DCCTV , A.DCAIR AS DCAIR , A.ASTDA AS ASTDA , A.DUOPB AS DUOPB , A.AINOV AS AINOV , A.ASTD AS ASTD , A.DELD AS DELD , A.DSV2 AS DSV2 , A.DHSBT AS DHSBT
FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT073 AS A WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.DEPT = #DEPT# AND A.GJAHR = #GJAHR# AND A.ITEM = #ITEM# AND A.MATNR = #MATNR# WITH UR
